q1.question:
Please be aware that this serves undergraduate progression rules only.
Do I have pass marks in all modules this academic year? [Y/N]

q2.question: Do I have a weighted average of at least 50% for this year? [Y/N]

q3.question: Do I have a weighted stage average of at least 45%? [Y/N]

q4.question: Do I have a weighted stage average of at least 40%? [Y/N]

q5.question: Do I have at least 100 credits of pass? [Y/N]

q6.question: Do I have at least 90 credits of pass? [Y/N]

q7.question: Do I have at least 80 credits of pass? [Y/N]

q8.question: Do I have at least 110 credits at 30% or above? [Y/N]

q9.question: Do I have all marks at 30% or above? [Y/N]

q10.question:
[Supplementary regulations for 1st year students only.]
Have I passed G51PGA? [Y/N]
(If this question does not apply to you, enter 'Y').

q11.question:
You will have an opportunity to re-take exams for all failed modules.
If you have your re-sit results, did you satisfy any of the previous conditions? [Y/N]

q12.question:
Do you have at least 80 credits of pass and a stage average of at least 40%?
You will have a second opportunity to re0take exams for all failed modules.
If you have your 2nd re-sit results, did you satisfy any of the previous conditions? [Y/N]

progress.question: Congratulations! You progress to the next stage of your degree.

terminate.question: Unfortunately your results indicate that you cannot continue in your degree.
